mapper.insert: insert into doctorinfo (id,doctor_name, doctor_sex, hospital_name, offices_name, doctor_img, doctor_title, teach_title, doctor_administrative, doctor_degree, doctor_forte, email, phone_number, realAuth_id, bit_state, is_delete, doctor_about,version) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teachTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorAdministrative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorForte,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realAuthId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bitState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{doctorAbout,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},0)
mapper.select: select id, doctor_name, doctor_sex, hospital_name, offices_name, doctor_img, doctor_title, teach_title, doctor_administrative, doctor_degree, doctor_forte, email, phone_number, realAuth_id, bit_state, is_delete, doctor_about,version from doctorinfo where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, doctor_name, doctor_sex, hospital_name, offices_name, doctor_img, doctor_title, teach_title, doctor_administrative, doctor_degree, doctor_forte, email, phone_number, realAuth_id, bit_state, is_delete, doctor_about,version from doctorinfo
